_comment: String Format Example - Commands as simple strings (easiest to read and write)

_modes_explained.keepAlive: Command starts and runs in background while seqr continues to next command
_modes_explained.once: Command runs once and seqr waits for it to complete before continuing

cons: Shell parsing can be tricky with quotes and spaces
_usage.description: String format allows you to write commands exactly as you would in terminal
pros: Most familiar - looks like terminal commands
Good for simple commands without complex arguments
